definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation

sentences.english: He had cleared them out three years ago but they had all come back in again.
sentences.chinese: 祂三年前曾经把他们赶出去，但不久又回复旧观。

sentences.english: Where has religion taken shelter after Krsna has retired to His own abode?
sentences.chinese: 当奎师那离开回到祂自己的居所后宗教到哪里去托庇？

sentences.english: Why did he let them suffer such cruel hardships?
sentences.chinese: 祂为何容让他们饱受如此残酷的虐待？

sentences.english: Praise God that He loves the oft-forgotten elderly.
sentences.chinese: 感谢神，祂的慈爱遍及被人遗忘的老人。

sentences.english: Today, all who believe in Jesus are clothed in his Sonship.
sentences.chinese: 今天，凡相信主的也给穿上了祂儿子的名份。

sentences.english: He shall come down like rain upon the mown grass.
sentences.chinese: 祂必降临，像雨降在已割的草地上。

sentences.english: He will continually bring you to times when you must trust Him.
sentences.chinese: 祂会不断地领你走到你非信靠祂不可的境地。

sentences.english: He will continually bring you to times when you must trust Him.
sentences.chinese: 祂会不断地领你走到你非信靠祂不可的境地。

sentences.english: He created little boys, full of spirit and fun.
sentences.chinese: 祂创造了小男孩，让他浑身是劲和兴味。

sentences.english: Now we are entering the third and final year of His earthly ministry.
sentences.chinese: 如今我们进入祂在世事奉的第三年，也是最后一年。

sentences.english: Good tiding for Christmas and a happy new year!
sentences.chinese: 祂祝福你新年常常平安愉快。

sentences.english: Christ expiated the sins and propitiated the divine wrath for all his people.
sentences.chinese: 基督替祂的子民赎了他们的罪，并且挽回了神的忿怒。

sentences.english: His hand is so warm that make me quiet.
sentences.chinese: 祂得手掌是如此得温煖，使皒静下来。

sentences.english: When Moses was at Mount Sinai God chose to reveal his face.
sentences.chinese: 摩西在西乃山上时，上帝定意显明祂的面。

sentences.english: Thus, God's dispensation is first a matter of His household economy, or family economy.
sentences.chinese: 因此，神的经纶首先是祂的家庭经营的事。

sentences.english: Does the LORD say this to me?Yes, if I have known His name.
sentences.chinese: 主可曾对我说过这番话﹖是的，我知道祂的名。

definition: Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
Abba (Aramaic word father)/by ext. God the Father in Christian gospel
memorial tablet in a temple commemorating a deceased father
